body.p: The undersigned citizens of the countys of Greenup & Carter would respectfully Solicit that Your Excellency will pardon John Baise from a Judgment rendered at the Nov Term 1859 of the Greenup Circuit Court. Charged with an assault on Moses Allen. We believe said fine excessive and unjust He is a very poor man and has now been in jail for five months and longer confinement will be cruel and unjust We pray you Excellency to remit all the said Judgment.

Asa Bellow
